title: RIOT what is going on!!
body: just started a game of URF, got to about 10 mins in and me and two other people in my party have dced and we cannot join back into the game, RIOT FIX THIS PROBLEM PLEASE. Anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body:
Dear Rito,

I am on the 5/20  (Five  20 min  timeout penalty's ) this situation arose from Leave Buster punishing me for AFK which stems from getting ridiculously high ping prior to my client freezing . The time it takes for me to absolve this conundrum thanks in part to the internet, OCE server and my slow as teamo PC is rewarded with my dreams of ever going past bronze V this season  a nightmare .

And Yes thank you for the reply Riot Panda for the reply.

if this is happening to you maybe uninstall and then re-install or send ur logs and get a ticket from riot ive had this problem if u are normaly getting high ping do what i used to do wait about 20 mins before joining a queue and waiting 20 mins more for your lbs or u could do a custom game to test your ping and see whats its like trust me dude i know how it feels to be doing lbs 20 mins waits ive done about 50 now   so ik what its like but dont try asking riot to take them off cos they wont         

on the friendly side i could duo queue with you for a bit get you out off b5 on my main  add this acc and ill give u ign

if this is happening to you maybe uninstall and then re-install or send ur logs and get a ticket from riot ive had this problem if u are normaly getting high ping do what i used to do wait about 20 mins before joining a queue and waiting 20 mins more for your lbs or u could do a custom game to test your ping and see whats its like trust me dude i know how it feels to be doing lbs 20 mins waits ive done about 50 now   so ik what its like but dont try asking riot to take them off cos they wont         

on the friendly side i could duo queue with you for a bit get you out off b5 on my main  add this acc and ill give u ign

I've seen a lot of threads like this, I posted a similar one as well.
Riot doesn't seem to be acknowledging them right now though.
Looks like I get a DC for Riot making a routing issue with the current patch. Nice.
